knowledge_entries.question: How do I get verified?
knowledge_entries.answer: Getting verified takes just 5 minutes! Go to Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Verification ‚Üí 'Get Verified'. Upload your government ID, take a live selfie, fill in your info, and submit. You'll be verified within 24 hours (usually 4-12 hours). Once approved, you get a blue badge and unlock premium features!

knowledge_entries.question: What documents are accepted for verification?
knowledge_entries.answer: Accepted IDs: Driver's License, Passport, National ID Card, or State ID Card from any country. Must be current (not expired), show all 4 corners clearly, and have readable text. No photocopies or screenshots - original documents only!

knowledge_entries.question: How long does verification take?
knowledge_entries.answer: Average verification time is 4-12 hours, with a maximum of 24 hours. Most applications are reviewed within 8 hours! Submit during business hours (9am-5pm EST) for fastest approval. You'll get an email notification once approved.

knowledge_entries.question: Why was my verification rejected?
knowledge_entries.answer: Common reasons: Blurry ID photo (40%), poor selfie lighting (25%), info doesn't match ID (20%), or expired document (10%). Check your rejection email for the specific reason. You can reapply immediately with better photos and correct info!

knowledge_entries.question: What are the benefits of getting verified?
knowledge_entries.answer: HUGE benefits! Blue verified badge on profile, 40% higher subscription rates, unlock live streaming, priority customer support, higher search ranking, featured creator opportunities, priority payouts, and fans trust you more. Totally worth 5 minutes!

knowledge_entries.question: How do I take a good ID photo?
knowledge_entries.answer: Pro tips: Use natural lighting (no flash!), lay ID flat on dark background, ensure all 4 corners visible, keep camera steady, take high-res photo (no blur), all text readable. DON'T use flash (glare!), crop edges, or use photocopies. Retake if unclear!

knowledge_entries.question: Why do I need to take a selfie?
knowledge_entries.answer: The live selfie confirms you're the person on the ID - prevents fraud and impersonation! We compare it to your ID photo. Take it in good lighting, face the light source, remove hats/sunglasses, keep hair away from face, and look directly at camera. Takes 30 seconds!

knowledge_entries.question: Is my personal information safe?
knowledge_entries.answer: Absolutely! Your ID and personal info are encrypted with bank-level security, stored securely, only viewable by our verification team, and auto-deleted after verification. Fans only see your blue badge - NOT your legal name, ID, age, or personal details. You're in control!

knowledge_entries.question: Can I get verified without a government ID?
knowledge_entries.answer: Unfortunately, no. Government-issued ID is required for all verifications to comply with age verification laws and prevent fraud. Accepted: Driver's License, Passport, National ID, or State ID. If you don't have any of these, contact support to discuss options.

knowledge_entries.question: What if my ID is expired?
knowledge_entries.answer: Expired IDs cannot be used for verification. You'll need to renew your ID first, or use a different valid government ID (passport, national ID, etc.). If renewal is in process and urgent, contact support with proof of renewal application.

knowledge_entries.question: Can I lose my verification badge?
knowledge_entries.answer: Your badge stays active as long as you follow community guidelines and maintain good standing. You could lose it for: repeated content violations, fraud, terms violations, chargebacks, or 12+ months inactivity. If removed, you get 7 days to appeal and can reapply after 30 days.

knowledge_entries.question: What's the difference between blue badge and gold badge?
knowledge_entries.answer: Blue badge = standard verified creator. Gold badge = celebrity/influencer/public figure verification (50K+ followers on other platforms, press mentions, etc.). Gold gets top search placement, featured opportunities, and business features. Apply via 'Public Figure Verification' after getting blue badge first!

knowledge_entries.question: My verification is taking longer than 24 hours
knowledge_entries.answer: Check spam folder for emails, view status in your dashboard. If over 48 hours with no response, contact support with your submission timestamp. Weekend/holiday submissions may take longer. Most delays are from needing additional info - check for emails from verification team!

knowledge_entries.question: Do I need to be verified to use the platform?
knowledge_entries.answer: No, verification is optional! You can create content, earn money, and build your fanbase without it. However, verified creators earn 40% more on average, unlock live streaming, get priority support, and rank higher in search. Highly recommended for serious creators!

knowledge_entries.question: Can I use a different name than what's on my ID?
knowledge_entries.answer: Your legal name (from ID) is required for verification, but fans only see your display name/stage name! Legal name is private and only used for verification, taxes, and payouts. You have full control over your public profile name, bio, and branding. Best of both worlds!
